sentences: Jonathan Lyndale Kirk (born December 22, 1991), known professionally as DaBaby (formerly known as Baby Jesus), is an American rapper.
After releasing several mixtapes between 2014 and 2018, he rose to mainstream prominence in 2019.
After releasing several mixtapes between 2014 and 2018, he rose to mainstream prominence in 2019.
DaBaby's debut studio album Baby on Baby (2019) peaked at number seven on the Billboard 200, while his second studio album, Kirk (2019), debuted at number one.
DaBaby's debut studio album Baby on Baby (2019) peaked at number seven on the Billboard 200, while his second studio album, Kirk (2019), debuted at number one.
His third studio album, Blame It on Baby (2020), became his second consecutive number-one album in the US.
The album included his highest-charting song, "Rockstar" (featuring Roddy Ricch), which spent seven non-consecutive weeks at number one on the Billboard Hot 100.
Jonathan Lyndale Kirk was born on December 22, 1991, in Cleveland, Ohio.
